game.name: Don't Press
game.shortDescription: Don’t Press is a 2D game full of unique levels and challenges, where the goal is simple — press the right button. But be careful: each level introduces new mechanics, environments, and dangers. One mistake, and everything can go wrong.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Don’t Press is a 2D game full of unique levels and challenges, where the goal is simple — press the right button. But be careful: each level introduces new mechanics, environments, and dangers. One mistake, and everything can go wrong.
